text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia restii is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope)
text.Notes:
Additional information regarding this species:
Habitat: Known from seamounts and knolls
